segments.text: I'm looking into a kitchen right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bright day, I can tell by the light coming through the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman at the sink, drying a plate quite meticulously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I notice the sink is really overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just pouring over the edge and onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is actually standing right in the puddle, but she doesn't react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, two children are up to something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is on a stool, reaching into a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly wobbly, almost tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is eagerly waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to happen, all while she just keeps drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone be so oblivious to so much going on around them?
segments.speaker: PAR
